Leaf examples and tutorials

  • Basic example, also accompained by a tutorial.
  • Python/R example, using calls to R from within Python. Requires rpy Python package.
    The published protocol (automatically generated from the python sources) for this example can be seen here.
  • Real World example, LGL code only. This example is extracted from a real world study whose results are still unpublished. The exported protocol (automatically generated from the python sources) can be seen here.
